DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy new multipurpose disinfect solution silicone hydrogel soft contact lens wearer .
DOC.brief_title: Lens Wearing Experience Biocompatibility Multi-Purpose Disinfecting Solution ( MPDS )
DOC.criteria: Wear silicone hydrogel traditional soft contact lenses daily wear basis , ( minimum 8 hour per day ) least one month prior Visit 1 ; Habitual use multipurpose solution contain PHMB least 30 day prior Visit 1 ; Vision correctable 20/30 ( Snellen ) good eye distance prestudy lenses Visit 1 ; Read , sign , date IRBapproved inform consent privacy document ; Be generally healthy normal ocular health ; Willing follow study procedure visit schedule ; Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Exclusion Criteria Wear lenses extend wear basis study ; Known sensitivity intolerance PHMB , POLYQUAD , ALDOX preserve lens care product ; Monocular subject ; Requirestoric multifocal contact lens ; Use additional lens care product PHMB multipurpose solution daily enzyme cleaner within one week prior Visit 1 ; Use topical ocular overthecounter ( OTC ) prescribe topical ocular medication , exception rewetting drop , within 7 day prior Visit 1 ; Any abnormal ocular condition observe Visit 1 Slitlamp examination ; Ocular surgery within 12 month prior Visit 1 ; Use systemic medication know expect ocular systemic side effect Visit 1 , clinical judgment investigator , could affect subject 's participation study ; Any systemic disease Visit 1 may affect eye exacerabated use contact lenses contact lens solution could prevent subject wear lens least 8 hour per day ; Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 ; Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
